skpm.name: Sketch WCAG
skpm.description: A Sketch plugin that lets you contrast test your entire color palette against the WCAG 2.0 guidelines all at once.

scripts.postinstall: npm run build && skpm-link && mkdir -p sketch-wcag.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources && cp src/styles.css src/icon.png sketch-wcag.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources
